message: Excoriating human trafficking as “nothing less than modern-day slavery,” San Bernardino County Supervisors Chairman Robert Lovingood announced Thursday the board has allocated $1.1 million in supplemental funding to fight it and other criminal activities.

data.description: Excoriating human trafficking as "nothing less than modern-day slavery," San Bernardino County Supervisors Chairman Robert Lovingood announced
data.title: Board allocates $1.1 million to DA's fight against human trafficking, animal cruelty
